description: Let P = 2*3*5*..*p_n = n-th primorial number (A002110), G = Z_2xZ_3x...xZ_{p_n}; a(n) = max{e in G} min{i : both e+i, e-i are relatively prime to P}.
author: Paw Hermansen (paw(AT)imada.ou.dk)
extensions: I added the two terms a(9)=165 and a(10)=213, which were found by a computer program that searched through all numbers. Michael Hovdan (michael.hovdan(AT)gmail.com), Aug 31 2009
